person.persName: Stephen D. Barton (Henry County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier.)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Bourbon County, Kentucky, native. Son of David Barton and Elizabeth Marsh Barton. Married to Phoebe Ridgeway Barton in Henry County, Kentucky, on September 8, 1853. Father of Mary Elizabeth Barton, Sarah Barton, and Mimie Barton. Farmer in Henry County in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860.
